title: All Your Tomorrows
description: After a euphoric week……comes the time apart.Will Jack’s tour cost him the love he deserves?Emily is struggling. She misses Jack and it’s worse than she imagined. But she loves her job and her work family. Can their relationship survive so much time apart? Was it all too good to be true?Music has been Jack’s passion. There’s nothing like the energy of the audience to make all the hard work worth it, but he misses Emily.One will need to change their life for the other.And none of that matters if the stalker takes their obsession to the next level.You’ll adore this conclusion to the Emily and Jack trilogy, because the challenges are real, and the romance is forever.Get it now.
author: Jessica Marlowe
